text: Tuhanu ki ho'i'a ki tusim alaha de raha vica yudha nahim karade. Unham kamazora maradam auratam ate baci'am de la'i, jihare kahide hana ki he sade palanahara! Sanu isa basati vicom kadha, jisa de vasi zalima hana ate sade la'i apane pasom ko'i samarathaka paida kara ate sade la'i apane pasom ko'i saha'ika kharha kara de
